CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.title: Tester
CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME has always been interested in testing things. Ever since HE was young, HE has been fiddling with and testing things.

CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.title: Tinkerer
CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME never lost HIS love for tinkering and testing. HECAP used HIS childhood skills to further a promising career as a tinkerer.
